long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Managiness allows business owners or product managers to track browser activity of their managers. See what your managers do right now, where they spend most of the time. Check productivity of previous days. Get automatic daily/weekly/monthly brief reports with manager activity (soon).

Managiness makes a record about spent time on a single website every 5 minutes and also at the moment a manager leaves the website.

Have questions or comments about Managiness? Email me at contact@flashag.net, I would love to hear from you!
